level.heading: Signage.
level.text: ยง 27-292.18 Signage.--(a) Symbols of accessiblility shall be provided at the following locations: Parking spaces designated as reserved for people having physical disabilities Passenger loading zones Public toilet and bathing facilities Drinking fountains Public telephones (b) Information and directional signage shall be provided where deemed necessary. (c) Symbols and characters shall comply with the applicable requirements set forth in reference standard RS 4-6.
